__e: The mother hired me, then fired me because of the cops.
She was younger than you, prettier than you, and of child-bearing age-- all of the things you are not, and you fired her for it.
And then my boss fired me for being late.
And in the end, because she didn't allow it to happen, The bloke sacked her, got someone else in.
He said goodbye and left as if nothing had happened.
Your dad fired me, and I got dumped all because you're just a little slut who was asking for it!
She threw me a big wave when she drove off.
How many times do you think he said goodbye to us... or that we have said goodbye to him?
It was his way of... telling me how much he loved me. And goodbye.
I just got off the phone with him, and he fired the firm because I left.
And so he said goodbye to his wife and his family and, with his students around him, he calmly prepared to die.
And the weird thing is he fired us at the same time for the same exact reason.
